meanings.definition: A competition to determine the best team or player in a particular sport.
meanings.sent1: The championships brought together teams from all over the country.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her basketball championships trophy.
meanings.sent3: The championships were so intense that even the referees were sweating!
meanings.sent4: Winning the championships felt like reaching the top of a mountain after a long climb.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the crowd cheering during the championships echoed in his ears for days.

meanings.definition: The position or title of being a champion.
meanings.sent1: After winning the championships, she held the title with pride.
meanings.sent2: His championships in swimming made him a local hero.
meanings.sent3: Wearing the championships belt made him feel invincible.
meanings.sent4: The championships crown symbolized his hard-earned victory.
meanings.sent5: The championships medal gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of his success.

meanings.definition: A series of games or matches to determine a winner.
meanings.sent1: The championships lasted for a week with intense matches every day.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly awaited the start of the championships.
meanings.sent3: The championships turned into a nail-biting showdown between the top teams.
meanings.sent4: Each team fought fiercely to advance in the championships.
meanings.sent5: The championships finale was a spectacle of skill and determination.
